occultborn.description: Mortals touched by forbidden knowledge, gaining dark and arcane attunement.

monastic.description: Disciplined ascetics who refine body and spirit through rigorous training.

duelist.description: Agile fighters specializing in precision strikes and swift footwork.

banditfolk.description: Rough survivalists who rely on cunning, speed, and opportunistic strikes.

spirit_medium.description: Humans attuned to the spirit realm, channeling ethereal energies.

tribalborn.description: Members of ancient tribes with strong physical instincts and natural resilience.

holyborn.description: Blessed mortals infused with divine radiance and protective magic.

trainee.description: A novice adventurer with balanced potential and no specialized growth.

thief.description: Quick‑handed rogues who excel at speed, stealth, and opportunistic strikes.

rogue.description: Shadowy assassins who rely on agility and lethal precision.

bozo.description: Chaotic tricksters whose unpredictable nature warps their combat style.

corrupted.description: Humanoids twisted by dark influence, gaining toxic and shadowy power.

rot.description: Mortals infected with necrotic decay, gaining resilience and rot‑based magic.

trickster.description: Mischievous illusionists who manipulate perception and misdirection.

void.description: Humanoids partially consumed by void energy, gaining unstable power.

apocalypse.description: Harbingers of ruin empowered by chaotic and destructive forces.

adept.description: Novice spellcasters with growing arcane potential.

acolyte.description: Devout initiates who channel holy magic through faith and discipline.

cleric.description: Holy spellcasters specializing in healing and protective magic.

guardian.description: Stalwart defenders who excel at protection and physical resilience.

warrior.description: Versatile melee fighters with strong physical growth.

ranger.description: Skilled hunters who blend agility with natural attunement.

assassin.description: Deadly killers who rely on speed, stealth, and lethal precision.

necromancer.description: Masters of death magic who command decay and the undead.

witch.description: Coven‑trained casters who wield curses and forbidden magic.

warlock.description: Pact‑bound casters who draw power from eldritch patrons.

mage.description: Arcane scholars who specialize in ranged magical combat.

healer.description: Support casters who excel at healing and restorative magic.

shaman.description: Spiritual casters who channel elemental forces and ancestral spirits.

druid.description: Nature‑bound casters who command flora, fauna, and primal magic.

high_elf.description: Noble elves with strong arcane lineage and exceptional magical aptitude.

wood_elf.description: Forest‑dwelling elves attuned to nature, archery, and agile combat.

shadow_elf.description: Elves who embraced the shadows, gaining stealth and dark affinity.

sun_elf.description: Radiant elves empowered by sunlight and celestial magic.

moon_elf.description: Mystic elves who draw power from moonlight and subtle arcane forces.

storm_elf.description: Swift elves infused with storm energy, excelling in speed and agility.

ember_elf.description: Fiery elves who channel flame and aggressive elemental magic.

frost_elf.description: Cold‑attuned elves who wield frost magic with precision and control.

thorn_elf.description: Elves bonded with thorned flora, gaining resilience and toxic magic.

astral_elf.description: Cosmic‑touched elves who manipulate astral currents and temporal magic.

stone_dwarf.description: Stout dwarves with bodies hardened like stone, excelling in physical defense.

ember_dwarf.description: Fire‑touched dwarves who channel volcanic heat into their strikes.

iron_dwarf.description: Dwarves with iron‑like skin and unmatched resilience in battle.

deep_dwarf.description: Dwarves adapted to the deep caverns, gaining darkvision and earth affinity.

runeborn_dwarf.description: Arcane‑inscribed dwarves who channel runic magic through their bodies.

forge_dwarf.description: Master smiths whose bodies resonate with the heat and rhythm of the forge.

frost_dwarf.description: Cold‑adapted dwarves who thrive in frozen climates and wield frost magic.

mountain_dwarf.description: Traditional dwarves of the high peaks, known for strength and endurance.

bloodfury_orc.description: Savage orcs driven by bloodlust, gaining explosive offensive growth.

ironhide_orc.description: Thick‑skinned orcs with exceptional durability and defensive instincts.

ember_orc.description: Orcs infused with volcanic flame, channeling fiery aggression.

storm_orc.description: Orcs empowered by storm energy, gaining speed and shock‑based power.

bonecrusher_orc.description: Massive orcs who specialize in brute force and overwhelming physical might.

ashen_orc.description: Orcs touched by dark flame, blending aggression with shadowy power.

warborn_orc.description: Elite orcs bred for war, excelling in raw strength and battlefield endurance.

berserk_orc.description: Frenzied orcs who fight in a trance of rage, gaining chaotic power.

goblin.description: Small, fast, and cunning goblinoids known for opportunistic tactics.

hobgoblin.description: Disciplined goblinoids with stronger martial training and battlefield presence.

bugbear.description: Large, brutish goblinoids who excel in ambushes and raw physical power.

shadow_goblin.description: Stealth‑focused goblins who thrive in darkness and shadow magic.

poison_goblin.description: Toxic goblins who coat their weapons in venom and wield poisonous magic.

tinker_goblin.description: Inventive goblins who craft gadgets, traps, and unstable contraptions.

feral_goblin.description: Wild goblins with sharpened instincts and feral combat styles.

smoke_goblin.description: Elusive goblins who use smoke, confusion, and chaotic tricks in battle.

catkin.description: Agile feline beastkin with exceptional reflexes and swift movement.

wolfkin.description: Pack‑minded hunters with strong instincts and fierce physical power.

dogkin.description: Loyal and energetic beastkin known for agility and balanced growth.

tigerkin.description: Powerful striped hunters with explosive strength and predatory instincts.

boarkin.description: Sturdy boar‑like beastkin with strong physical resilience and charging power.

foxkin.description: Clever and elusive fox‑folk who blend agility with trickery.

bearkin.description: Massive beastkin with overwhelming strength and natural toughness.

hawkkin.description: Aerial beastkin with unmatched speed and sharp precision.

serpentkin.description: Slithering beastkin who wield venom and swift, unpredictable strikes.

stagkin.description: Graceful forest beastkin with strong natural attunement and agility.

fire_draconian.description: Draconians infused with blazing flame, excelling in fiery offense and resilience.

frost_draconian.description: Cold‑blooded draconians who wield frost magic and possess hardened scales.

storm_draconian.description: Lightning‑charged draconians with incredible speed and storm‑born power.

crystal_draconian.description: Arcane‑infused draconians whose crystalline scales channel pure magical energy.

earth_draconian.description: Massive draconians with stone‑like scales and unmatched physical durability.

ember_draconian.description: Ash‑touched draconians who wield smoldering flame and volcanic heat.

void_draconian.description: Warped draconians touched by the void, gaining unstable but potent magic.

stormscale_draconian.description: Draconians with electrically charged scales that crackle with storm energy.

sun_draconian.description: Radiant draconians empowered by solar energy and celestial flame.

shadow_draconian.description: Stealthy draconians who manipulate shadow and strike with lethal precision.

skeleton.description: Reanimated bone warriors with steady physical growth and dark attunement.

ghoul.description: Ferocious undead driven by hunger, gaining toxic and darkened power.

wraith.description: Spectral undead who drift through shadows and wield potent dark magic.

banshee.description: Wailing spirits whose haunting cries channel destructive spectral energy.

death_knight.description: Armored undead champions empowered by necrotic and frost‑tinged magic.

mummy.description: Ancient preserved undead wrapped in cursed bindings and desert magic.

shade.description: Shadow‑formed undead who strike swiftly from darkness.

lichling.description: Lesser liches who wield potent necromantic and arcane magic.

bone_horror.description: Twisted amalgamations of bone animated by powerful necrotic energy.

spiritbound.description: Undead whose souls remain partially tethered to the mortal realm.

succubus.description: Seductive fiends who wield charm, shadow magic, and swift movement.

demon_knight.description: Armored infernal warriors empowered by flame and shadow.

abyssal_brute.description: Massive demons of raw strength, born from the deepest abyss.

hellfire_spawn.description: Infernal beings infused with pure hellfire, excelling in burning magic.

shadowfiend.description: Swift and deadly demons who strike from the shadows.

chaos_imp.description: Unpredictable imps whose chaotic magic warps the battlefield.

infernal_magus.description: Demonic spellcasters who channel infernal flames and shadow sorcery.

ashen_demon.description: Demons born from smoldering ash, wielding burning and choking magic.

void_demon.description: Abyssal demons infused with void energy, gaining unstable destructive power.

hellion.description: Savage infernal warriors who thrive in burning chaos and relentless combat.

void_reaver.description: Aggressive void entities that tear through reality with unstable power.

nullborn_ravager.description: Warped beings whose presence erases magic and destabilizes the world around them.

shadehound.description: Void‑touched predators that stalk prey between shadows and broken space.

astral_voidling.description: Cosmic anomalies born from collapsed stars and void‑warped astral energy.

entropy_spawn.description: Manifestations of entropy that unravel order and feed on instability.

hollowborn.description: Emptied beings whose bodies echo with void resonance and eerie silence.

riftstalker.description: Swift hunters who slip between rifts, striking from impossible angles.

void_savant.description: Void scholars who manipulate forbidden cosmic principles with immense mana.

abyss_touched.description: Mortals partially consumed by the abyss, gaining dark and void synergy.

nullshade.description: Shadow‑thin voidborn who flicker between existence and nothingness.

seraph.description: Radiant winged beings who embody divine purity and celestial might.

archon.description: Stalwart celestial guardians who enforce divine order with unwavering resolve.

herald.description: Messengers of the heavens who channel radiant magic with grace and speed.

dawnborne.description: Celestialborn touched by the first light of dawn, wielding luminous power.

radiant_ascendant.description: Ascended beings who channel pure radiance and overwhelming divine mana.

halo_guardian.description: Celestial protectors whose glowing halos shield allies from harm.

luminary.description: Swift celestialborn who wield beams of concentrated light.

starborne.description: Cosmic‑touched celestials who draw power from distant starlight.

sunforged.description: Celestialborn forged in solar flame, radiating intense heat and brilliance.

duskwarden.description: Guardians of twilight who balance fading light with divine vigilance.

ember_spirit.description: A fiery spirit whose burning essence fuels aggressive elemental magic.

river_spirit.description: A fluid spirit attuned to flowing water and restorative magic.

wind_spirit.description: A swift spirit of the air, moving with unmatched speed and grace.

stone_spirit.description: A sturdy spirit formed from ancient stone, embodying resilience and stability.

storm_spirit.description: A volatile spirit born of thunder and lightning, crackling with raw energy.

forest_spirit.description: A guardian of the wilds, channeling the life force of ancient forests.

shadow_spirit.description: A spirit woven from darkness, striking swiftly from the shadows.

ancestral_spirit.description: A venerable spirit carrying the wisdom and magic of ancient ancestors.

emberwisp.description: A tiny flickering spirit of flame, swift and magically potent.

mist_spirit.description: A drifting spirit of fog and chill, elusive and ethereal.
